Glimpse.Autofac adds one Glimpse plugin; Autofac

To activate Glimpse for Autofac, simply call container.ActivateGlimpse()

Release Notes
-------------------------
0.2.0 - Updated to Glimpse 1.0.0
0.2.3 - Downgraded Autofac dependency to 2.6.3.862, in order to work with Autofac.Mvc3
0.2.4 - Added Glimpse logo to NuGet package
